item.title: Empowering Privacy: Understanding the CCPA and Your Rights
item.category: "Cybersecurity" , "Data Privacy" , "Legislation" , "Digital Rights" , "Consumer Protection" , "California Law" , "Online Privacy" , "Data Regulation" , "Privacy Rights" , "Personal Data"
item.description: Explore the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) and learn how it empowers consumers to control their data privacy.

item.title: Safeguarding Classified Data: Benefits Beyond Security for Success and Trust
item.category: "Data Protection" , "Cybersecurity" , "Business Ethics" , "Information Security" , "Privacy Rights" , "Risk Management" , "Digital Trust" , "Data Governance" , "Economic Impact" , "Personal Privacy"
item.description: Discover the profound advantages of protecting classified data, from economic growth to ethical integrity. Explore the positive impact on security and reputation.

item.title: Recommended Privacy Resources
item.category: "Recommended Privacy Resources" , "Privacy Rights" , "Identity Theft Protection" , "Digital Security" , "Cyber Criminals" , "Mass Surveillance" , "Personal Data Protection" , "Family Privacy" , "Children's Privacy" , "Teens' Privacy" , "Digital Security Hygiene" , "Credit Report" , "Credit Freeze" , "Defensive Computing Checklist" , "Personal Data Removal" , "Fraud Reporting" , "Privacy Services" , "Information Masking" , "Account Management" , "GDPR Requests" , "Account Deletion"
item.description: Discover recommended privacy resources for protecting your rights, family, and personal information, including identity theft protection, digital security, and privacy rights, to stay safe from cyber criminals and mass surveillance.
